TopicTitle: historic spacecraft (bet this is somewhere else in here)

Articles.Content:
I bet this is somewhere else in this forum but couldn't find it

great drawings of many historic probes and rockets

might use this when 20.0 comes out for a role playing campaign

http://www.chartgeek.com/space-probes-chart/

http://historicspacecraft.com/
Whoa cool. I'm still trying to stuff my brain with knowledge in this field and this is a great resource! Thanks!
